title: Amazon FBA VA – Online Arbitrage Product Researcher (Remote, Full-Time)
job_overview:
We’re an e-commerce business based in Canada, looking for a highly motivated, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant with proven experience in Amazon FBA Online Arbitrage, especially for the US and Canadian marketplaces.

This is a long-term, full-time role with growth opportunities for the right candidate.

? Your Responsibilities

- Source profitable products for Online Arbitrage using tools like Keepa and SellerAmp
- Perform manual sourcing through retail websites
- Evaluate product profitability and ROI using sales rank and historical data
- Record all leads accurately in Google Sheets
- Assist with other Amazon Seller Central tasks as needed

????? Required Skills & Tools

- Strong experience with Keepa (Preferred)
- Familiarity with SellerAmp and Amazon Seller Central (Preferred)
- Solid understanding of Sales Rank and basic product criteria
- Good command of written English
- Reliable, high-speed internet connection

???? What You Get

- Flexible working hours (as long as tasks are done daily)
- Bi-weekly payments via Wise or Payoneer
- Paid time off (flexible and upon request)
- Opportunity to grow within a fast-moving Amazon FBA business
- Supportive team and ongoing training

???? Hiring Process
Applicants will be asked to complete a short test task (30 minutes max) to evaluate sourcing skills and attention to detail. Only those who pass will proceed to the final interview.

???? To Apply

Please reply with the following:
- Your experience with Keepa, SellerAmp, and product sourcing
- Your favorite product category to source and why
- The sport you practice (just for fun — helps us get to know you!)
- Include the word “FINDGEMS” in your subject line or first sentence so we know you read the full post
